1: -module(meeting_SUITE).
    2: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
    3: -export([all/0, init_per_group/2, end_per_group/2, groups/0]).
    4: -export([carla/1, mark/1, dog/1, all_same_owner/1]).
    5: 
    6: 
    7: all() -> [{group, session}].
    8: 
    9: groups() -> [{session, [], [{group, clients}, all_same_owner]},
   10: 			{clients, [parallel, {repeat, 10}], [carla, mark,dog]}].
   11: 
   12: init_per_group(session, Config) ->
   13: 	meeting:start(),
   14: 	Config;
   15: init_per_group(_,Config) ->
   16: 	Config.
   17: 
   18: end_per_group(session, _Config) ->
   19: 	meeting:stop();
   20: end_per_group(_, _Config) ->
   21: 	ok.
   22: 
   23: 
   24: carla(_Config) ->
   25: 	meeting:book_room(women),
   26: 	timer:sleep(10),
   27: 	meeting:rent_projector(women),
   28: 	timer:sleep(10),
   29: 	meeting:use_chairs(women).
   30: 
   31: mark(_Config) ->
   32: 	meeting:rent_projector(men),
   33: 	timer:sleep(10),
   34: 	meeting:use_chairs(men),
   35: 	timer:sleep(10),
   36: 	meeting:book_room(men).
   37: 
   38: dog(_Config) ->
   39: 	meeting:rent_projector(animals),
   40: 	timer:sleep(10),
   41: 	meeting:use_chairs(animals),
   42: 	timer:sleep(10),
   43: 	meeting:book_room(animals).
   44: 
   45: all_same_owner(_Config) ->
   46: 	[{_, Owner}, {_,Owner}, {_,Owner}] = meeting:get_all_bookings().
